description: Ensure system prevents creation of contacts with duplicate emails and displays error message.
preconditions: User is logged into the CRM system.
A contact with the email 'test@example.com' already exists.

testData.scenario: Attempt to create a new contact with an email that already exists in the system.
testData.expectedResult: System displays an error message indicating the email is already in use.
testData.postCondition: No duplicate contact is saved in the CRM system.

testData.scenario: Edge Case: Attempt to create a new contact with the same email but different letter case.
testData.expectedResult: System displays an error message indicating the email is already in use (case-insensitive check).
testData.postCondition: No duplicate contact is saved in the CRM system.

testData.scenario: Edge Case: Attempt to create a new contact with leading/trailing spaces in the email.
testData.expectedResult: System displays an error message indicating the email is already in use (ignoring spaces).
testData.postCondition: No duplicate contact is saved in the CRM system.
